title: Dr. Jeffrey Thompson - Healing Mind System 2 CD Set [FLAC]

The Healing Mind System CDs work by blending inaudible pulses of sound that mirror the brainwave pattern of the healing mind state into a soothing musical soundtrack. As you listen, your own brainwaves begin to reflect this same powerful brainwave pattern, drawing you easily into this restorative state.

CD 1: Healing Mind System
Healing the body by listening while exercising, doing yoga, reading, or just going about your daily activities. This peaceful soundtrack will help lead you to a place of relaxation and physical recuperation.

CD 2: Healing Mind System 2.0
